英文法規名稱: Fee-charging Standards for the Review, Approval and Revision of Senior Secondary School Textbooks
中文法規名稱: 高級中等學校教科用書審定及修訂費收費標準

法規內容.條文內容: This Standards was enacted in accordance with Paragraph 2, Article 48 of the Senior High School Education Act and Paragraph 1, Article 10 of the Charges and Fees Act.

Fees to be charged for the review, approval and revision of senior secondary school textbooks are as follows:
1. General schools:
(1) Review and approval fee: NT$25,000 per textbook
(2) Revision fee: NT$15,000 per textbook
2. Technical, comprehensive and specialized schools:
(1) Review and approval fee: NT$15,000 per textbook
(2) Revision fee: NT$7,500 per textbook
This Standards shall take effect on the day of promulgation.
